/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of vehicles including cars, buses, and motorcycles. The buildings that flank the street are painted in a palette of mostly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and green accents. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The image appears to have been captured during the day, as evidenced by the shadows cast by the buildings and vehicles.
